JOB DESCRIPTION: Job description         4-7 years Software Development (and Design) work experience using Java (Java expertise must)       Proficient in Rest based APIs/ microservices development using frameworks like springboot, dropwizard etc.       Knowledge of AWS (EC2,ECS, Lambda, containers/dockers) and CI/CD (Jenkins/Chef) is a must.       Knowledge of various software development technologies and frameworks such as JavaScript, JSON, XML       General understanding of databases (RDBMS, NoSQL) and ORMs.  Working knowledge of Agile Software Development methodologies (scrum, XP).
